title: 3M 8210 N95 Disposable Particulate Respirator, 20/Pack (8210)
highlights: Lightweight construction promotes greater worker acceptance and may help increase wear time
Certifications and standards: NIOSH approved for at least 95 percent filtration efficiency against certain non-oil based particles
Two-strap design with welded dual point attachment helps provide a secure seal

description.paragraph: This classic disposable N95 particulate respirator is designed to help provide comfortable, reliable worker respiratory protection against certain non-oil based particles.
bullets: Lightweight construction promotes greater worker acceptance and may help increase wear time
Certifications and standards: NIOSH approved for at least 95 percent filtration efficiency against certain non-oil based particles
Two-strap design with welded dual point attachment helps provide a secure seal
Advanced electrostatic media is designed for ease of breathing
